00021 #ifndef PRINTWRITER_H_
00022 #define PRINTWRITER_H_
00023 
00024 #include "../Core/Primitives.h"
00025 #include "../Core/String.h"
00026 #include "OutputStream.h"
00027 
00028 SYLPH_BEGIN_NAMESPACE
00029 SYLPH_PUBLIC
00030 
00031 class PrintWriter : public virtual Object {
00032     friend PrintWriter& dec(PrintWriter&);
00033     friend PrintWriter& hex(PrintWriter&);
00034     friend PrintWriter& oct(PrintWriter&);
00035 private:
00036     enum NumberType {
00037         DEC,
00038         HEX,
00039         OCT
00040     };
00041     
00042 public:
00043     PrintWriter(OutputStream& _out) : out(_out), _uc(false), _nt(DEC) {}
00044 
00045     OutputStream& outputStream();
00046     const OutputStream& outputStream() const;
00047 
00048     bool uppercase() const;
00049     void setUppercase(bool);
00050 
00051     bool toBool() const;
00052 
00053     PrintWriter& operator<<(bool b);
00054     PrintWriter& operator<<(char c);
00055     PrintWriter& operator<<(sint i);
00056     PrintWriter& operator<<(suint i);
00057     PrintWriter& operator<<(slong l);
00058     PrintWriter& operator<<(sulong l);
00059     PrintWriter& operator<<(float f);
00060     PrintWriter& operator<<(String s);
00061     PrintWriter& operator<<(PrintWriter&(*f)(PrintWriter&));
00062 private:
00063     OutputStream& out;
00064     bool _uc;
00065     NumberType _nt;
00066 };
00067 
00068 PrintWriter& flush(PrintWriter&);
00069 PrintWriter& endl(PrintWriter&);
00070 PrintWriter& ends(PrintWriter&);
00071 PrintWriter& dec(PrintWriter&);
00072 PrintWriter& hex(PrintWriter&);
00073 PrintWriter& oct(PrintWriter&);
00074 PrintWriter& uppercase(PrintWriter&);
00075 PrintWriter& nouppercase(PrintWriter&);
00076 
00077 SYLPH_END_NAMESPACE
00078 
00079 #endif  /* PRINTWRITER_H_ */
